sif3.infra.common.env.types
Class ProviderEnvironment

java.lang.Object
  sif3.infra.common.env.types.EnvironmentInfo
      sif3.infra.common.env.types.ProviderEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ProviderEnvironment
extends EnvironmentInfo

This class represents a provider environment. This is a more complex class than a consumer environment as it has to validate a numer of values when a consumer attempts to connect.

Author:
Joerg Huber
See Also:

Method Detail

getAllowAny

public boolean getAllowAny()
TRUE: Anyone with the correct 'Any'-username and 'Any'-password can connect to this environment. FALSE: onlu consumers with a given name, user and password can connect to this environment. See developer's guide for more details.

Returns:
See desc.
